componentDefinition.description: Production-ready deployment bundle pipeline with comprehensive compliance artifacts for secure software supply chain

controls.implementationStatement: TODO: Access control is implemented through IAM policies and OIDC authentication for keyless signing. Access to deployment bundles is controlled through Artifactory permissions and KMS key policies.
TODO: Access controls are enforced through least-privilege IAM policies, encrypted storage, and audit logging. All access to deployment bundles is logged and monitored.
TODO: Comprehensive audit trail is maintained including build timestamps, git commits, builder versions, and all security scan results. Audit logs are immutable and tamper-evident.
TODO: Audit logs include all security events, access attempts, and compliance validation results. Logs are stored in immutable format with cryptographic integrity protection.
TODO: Security assessments are performed through automated vulnerability scanning with grype, compliance reporting, and policy validation. All assessments are documented and tracked.
TODO: Configuration management is enforced through immutable deployment bundles with content-addressed references. All changes are tracked through git commits and build provenance.
TODO: Backup and recovery is ensured through immutable artifact storage in Artifactory with configurable retention policies. All deployment bundles are versioned and recoverable.
TODO: Incident response capabilities are supported through comprehensive audit trails, vulnerability scanning results, and rollback capabilities using immutable bundle references.
TODO: Vulnerability scanning is performed using grype with configurable severity thresholds. All vulnerabilities are tracked and reported with remediation guidance.
TODO: Developer security testing is enforced through mandatory vulnerability scanning, SBOM generation, and SLSA provenance attestations. All security controls are validated before deployment.
TODO: Supply chain protection is implemented through SBOM generation, SLSA provenance attestations, and signature verification. All dependencies are tracked and validated.
TODO: Boundary protection is implemented through network security controls, encrypted communication, and secure artifact storage. All network access is monitored and logged.
TODO: Cryptographic protection is implemented using FIPS-validated algorithms, KMS-based key management, and cosign for artifact signing. All cryptographic operations use approved algorithms.
TODO: Information at rest protection is implemented through encryption of all stored artifacts, immutable storage, and access controls. All data is encrypted using approved algorithms.

TODO: Flaw remediation is enforced through mandatory vulnerability scanning with policy gates. Critical vulnerabilities must be resolved before deployment. All vulnerabilities are tracked and reported.
TODO: Malicious code protection is implemented through vulnerability scanning, SBOM validation, and signature verification. All code is scanned and validated before deployment.
TODO: Information system monitoring is implemented through comprehensive logging, audit trails, and security event monitoring. All activities are logged and monitored for security events.
